title: Kelly Imposes Strict Order on White House Staff (Audio)
itunes:title: Kelly Imposes Strict Order on White House Staff (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- David Cohen, a political science professor at the University of Akron and an expert on White House chiefs of staff, discusses John Kelly's new role as President Trump's chief of staff. He speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
